entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
